modName: Weathered Orcish Armor and Weapons Retexture
summary: A simple but tasty texture replacer for Orcish items.  Less green, slightly rusted.
descriptionHtml:
A nice male and female Orcish retexture, replacing the vanilla textures.

I always avoided the Orcish armor due to its drab greenish hues.  So I set out to remedy that!  This is what I came up with, and I\'m really diggin it.  Hope some of you do as well.

More info to come...
author: Goliatron
